documentation.text:
@notice Return tokens for future minting
@param _amount Amount of tokens

@notice Donate sender's tokens. Amount of tokens will be returned for future minting
@param _value Amount to donate
@notice Returns the number of tokens that can be minted
@dev the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `verifyState`

constructor.details: Minting formula for one sub-stake in one period for the first phase firstPhaseMaxIssuance * (lockedValue / totalLockedValue) * (k1 + min(allLockedPeriods, kmax)) / k2Minting formula for one sub-stake in one period for the second phase (totalSupply - currentSupply) / d * (lockedValue / totalLockedValue) * (k1 + min(allLockedPeriods, kmax)) / k2 if allLockedPeriods > maximumRewardedPeriods then allLockedPeriods = maximumRewardedPeriods

params._firstPhaseMaxIssuance: (Imax) Maximum number of new tokens minted per period during Phase 1. See Equation 7 in Staking Protocol & Economics paper.
params._firstPhaseTotalSupply: Total supply for the first phase
params._issuanceDecayCoefficient: (d) Coefficient which modifies the rate at which the maximum issuance decays, only applicable to Phase 2. d = 365 * half-life / LOG2 where default half-life = 2. See Equation 10 in Staking Protocol & Economics paper
params._lockDurationCoefficient1: (k1) Numerator of the coefficient which modifies the extent  to which a stake's lock duration affects the subsidy it receives. Affects stakers differently.  Applicable to Phase 1 and Phase 2. k1 = k2 * small_stake_multiplier where default small_stake_multiplier = 0.5.   See Equation 8 in Staking Protocol & Economics paper.
params._lockDurationCoefficient2: (k2) Denominator of the coefficient which modifies the extent to which a stake's lock duration affects the subsidy it receives. Affects stakers differently. Applicable to Phase 1 and Phase 2. k2 = maximum_rewarded_periods / (1 - small_stake_multiplier) where default maximum_rewarded_periods = 365 and default small_stake_multiplier = 0.5. See Equation 8 in Staking Protocol & Economics paper.
params._maximumRewardedPeriods: (kmax) Number of periods beyond which a stake's lock duration no longer increases the subsidy it receives. kmax = reward_saturation * 365 where default reward_saturation = 1. See Equation 8 in Staking Protocol & Economics paper.

donate(uint256).notice: Donate sender's tokens. Amount of tokens will be returned for future minting

finishUpgrade(address).details: Copy values from the new target to the current storage

getReservedReward().notice: Returns the number of tokens that can be minted

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

verifyState(address).details: the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `verifyState`
